title: Baseball/Softball type fonts
content:
Hi,  
I am trying to track down some different type choices which may work well for a classic baseball or softball style logo. If anyone has any font recommendations please let me know!

Thanks
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
Home Run Script by Doyald Young

[http://www.doyaldyoung.com/111\_HR\_Script/111\_HR\_Script.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140630143758/http:/www.doyaldyoung.com/111_HR_Script/111_HR_Script.html "http://www.doyaldyoung.com/111\_HR\_Script/111\_HR\_Script.html")

ChrisL
Ballpark Script from Letterhead Fonts. Its got a nice selection of baseline swashes to boot...
